original: lha yi bla ma nyi ma dang // mig dmar skyes pa'i gzugs yin te; ;pa ba sangs dang sgra gcan dang // zla ba mo yi gzugs yin no //
analyzed: lha yi bla ma nyi ma dang // mig dmar skyes pa'i gzugs yin te; ;pa ba sangs dang sgra gcan dang // zla ba mo yi gzugs yin no //
translated: while Venus, Rāhu, and the moon are the forms of the female being.

original: gza' lag dang ni spen pa gnyis //
analyzed: gza' lag dang ni spen pa gnyis //
translated: The two, Mercury and Saturn,

original: ma ning nyid du bstan pa ste //🔽nam mkha'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i gza'; ;mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
analyzed: ma ning nyid du bstan pa ste // nam mkha'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i gza'; ;mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
translated: are taught to be the neuter.🔽The planets that abide in the wheel of space🔽are the vajra ḍākinīs,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /
translated: the supreme bliss of the union with all ḍākinīs.

original: rdo rje sems dang bde bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dang bde bzhin gshegs //
translated: They are Vajrasattva and the Tathāgata,

original: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //🔽rgyud kyi rgyal @423b chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs // rgyud kyi rgyal @423b chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las //
translated: taught by the Blessed One, the vajra holder.🔽This concludes the twenty-seventh chapter, on the procedure of the power of the stars, from “The glorious tantra of Vajraḍāka, the great king of tantras.

original: skar ma rnams kyi stobs la dbang ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: skar ma rnams kyi stobs la dbang ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
translated: The chapter on the procedure of the power of the stars.

original: tshes dang skar ma gza' 'chad ba //
analyzed: tshes dang skar ma gza' 'chad ba //
translated: The days, stars, and planets are explained

original: rab tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon //
analyzed: rab tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon //

original: ro hi ta yi tshes la ni //
analyzed: ro hi ta yi tshes la ni //
translated: On the Rohita lunar day,

original: smin drug dang ni mig dmar la //
analyzed: smin drug dang ni mig dmar la //
translated: in the stars of Puṣya and Aṅgāraka,

original: mgron po lam du 'jug par bzang //
analyzed: mgron po lam du 'jug par bzang //

analyzed: tshes de rnyed pa 'thob 'gyur ba'o // ma ka ra yi nyi ma la //
translated: One will obtain gain on that day.🔽On the day of Makara,

original: mchu dang mig dmar ldan pa la //
analyzed: mchu dang mig dmar ldan pa la //

original: gzer dang 'dzoms sogs 'byung bas na //
analyzed: gzer dang 'dzoms sogs 'byung bas na //

original: tshes de yongs su spang bar bya //🔽sva pa na yi nyi ma la //
analyzed: tshes de yongs su spang bar bya // sva pa na yi nyi ma la //
translated: One should avoid that day.🔽On the day of Svāti,

analyzed: lag dang spen par ldan pa'i tshe //

analyzed: nag po nyid du shes bya bas; ;tshes de'ang yongs su spang bar bya //

original: ro hi ta yi nyi ma la //
analyzed: ro hi ta yi nyi ma la //
translated: On the day of Rohiṇī,

original: mchu dang gza' lag ldan pa la //
analyzed: mchu dang gza' lag ldan pa la //
translated: when it is joined with Venus and Mars,

original: bkra shis dang ni bzang por byed //
analyzed: bkra shis dang ni bzang por byed //

original: randa yi ni nyi ma la //
analyzed: randa yi ni nyi ma la //

analyzed: lag dang gza' lag bcas pa dag /

analyzed: kun tu 'dzoms par bshad pas na //

analyzed: mchog gi sbyor bas de yang spang //

analyzed: sa yi dbang phyug tshes la ni //

analyzed: bra nye dang ni gza' lag ldan //

analyzed: de yang nag po'i dus shes bya //

original: bha dra yi ni tshes dag la //
analyzed: bha dra yi ni tshes dag la //

original: gre dang lha yi bla mar ldan //
analyzed: gre dang lha yi bla mar ldan //

original: tshes de rnyed pa byed pas na //
analyzed: tshes de rnyed pa byed pas na //

analyzed: sbyor ba po yis bsten bar bya // mi ki ra yi tshes la ni //
translated: should be attended to by the practitioner.🔽If Mercury and the lord of the gods

analyzed: mon gru lha yi bla ma dang // gal ten ni 'dzoms gyur na // 'bru dang nor rnams zad byed par //
translated: are joined on the day of Mercury,🔽it is said without doubt

analyzed: gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin // tshes ni bcu gsum dag la ni // skad dang lha yi bla ma dag /

original: gal te 'dzoms na @424a *//🔽nag po bas //
analyzed: gal te 'dzoms na @424a *// nag po bas //
translated: are joined on the thirteenth day,🔽all the evil

analyzed: nyes pa kun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur // bri sha bha yi tshes la ni //
translated: will be destroyed.🔽If the powerful minister

analyzed: stobs ldan gyi ni blon po dang // gal te khrums stod 'dzoms na ni //
translated: and Puṣya are joined on the day of Bṛhaspati,

original: tshes de rgyas pa ster 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: tshes de rgyas pa ster 'gyur zhing //

original: dge ba'i grogs rnams thams cad byed //
analyzed: dge ba'i grogs rnams thams cad byed //
translated: and do all that is virtuous.🔽If Āśleṣā and Maghā

analyzed: bri ddhi ka yi nyi ma la // chu stod dang ni pa ba sangs // gal te 'dzoms na nad kyis ni //
translated: are joined on the day of Bṛhaspatī,🔽there is no doubt that

original: gdungs shing 'joms par the tshom med //
analyzed: gdungs shing 'joms par the tshom med //
translated: one will be afflicted and destroyed by illness.🔽If Mṛgaśirā and Puṣya

original: 'byung po yi ni nyi ma la //🔽bra nye dang ni ba bsangs //
analyzed: 'byung po yi ni nyi ma la //🔽bra nye dang ni ba bsangs //

original: 'dzoms na gshin rje'i mche ba ste //
analyzed: 'dzoms na gshin rje'i mche ba ste //

original: tshes de yongs su spang bar bya //
analyzed: tshes de yongs su spang bar bya //
translated: That lunar day should be completely avoided.

original: kurma yi ni nyi ma la //
analyzed: kurma yi ni nyi ma la //
translated: On the day of the tortoise,

original: smin drug dang ni spen pa ru //
analyzed: smin drug dang ni spen pa ru //
translated: if there is a combination with the Pleiades and Saturn,

original: gal te 'dzoms par 'gyur na ni //
analyzed: gal te 'dzoms par 'gyur na ni //

analyzed: rnyed dang grags pa la sogs dang // bsod nams kun gyi 'bras bu 'thob //
translated: one will obtain the fruits of all gain, fame, and so forth, and merit.

original: bya ku li yi nyi ma ni //
analyzed: bya ku li yi nyi ma ni //

original: skag dang spen par ci zhig ltar //
analyzed: skag dang spen par ci zhig ltar //

original: 'dzoms na gdung bar byed pas na //
analyzed: 'dzoms na gdung bar byed pas na //

original: nyi ma de la'ang 'gro ba spang //
analyzed: nyi ma de la'ang 'gro ba spang //

original: zla ba nya yi nyi ma la //
analyzed: zla ba nya yi nyi ma la //

original: mchu dang spen par ldan gyur na //
analyzed: mchu dang spen par ldan gyur na //
translated: if there is a combination with the lunar mansion of Puṣya and Saturn,

original: 'chi ba'i dus la bab pas na //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus la bab pas na //
translated: since the time of death has arrived,

original: tshes de shin tu spang bar bya //
analyzed: tshes de shin tu spang bar bya //

analyzed: me yi mtshams su mi kir bri //

original: gshin rje du ni randa ste //🔽srin po ru ni karma bri //
analyzed: gshin rje du ni randa ste // srin po ru ni karma bri //

analyzed: chu yi phyogs su khyu mchog ste // 'jigs byed du ni bya ku la // gter gyi phyogs su sva pa na //

analyzed: mig gsum phyogs su bzang po bri //

analyzed: shar gyi phyogs su'ang khyu mchog go /

original: zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis //

original: de rnams su ni rgyu bar bshad //
analyzed: de rnams su ni rgyu bar bshad //

original: bha dra nas ni randar ste //
analyzed: bha dra nas ni randar ste //
translated: From Bhadrapada to Āśvayuja,

original: bya ku li dang bri sha bha //
analyzed: bya ku li dang bri sha bha //

original: @424b 'di dag nyi ma rgyu bar ni //
analyzed: @424b 'di dag nyi ma rgyu bar ni //

original: rigs mchog ma ni khyod la bshad //🔽khyu mchog dang ni mi ki ra //
analyzed: rigs mchog ma ni khyod la bshad // khyu mchog dang ni mi ki ra //
translated: I have explained to you the best of the signs.🔽The bull, and the peacock,

original: sva pa na dang kurma ni //
analyzed: sva pa na dang kurma ni //
translated: The swan, and the tortoise,

original: zla ba'i rgyu bar bshad pa ste //
analyzed: zla ba'i rgyu bar bshad pa ste //

analyzed: rim pa de ltar brjod pa yin // nya la me mtshams gnas pa ste //
translated: They are stated in that order.🔽On the full moon, it abides in the southeast,

original: stong la rlung gi phyogs su gnas //
analyzed: stong la rlung gi phyogs su gnas //
translated: On the new moon, it abides in the northwest.

original: de ltar de dag dbus su ni //
analyzed: de ltar de dag dbus su ni //
translated: Thus, in the middle of those,

analyzed: gnas pa de dag gdung bar 'gyur // zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i //
translated: They abide, tormented.🔽By viewing the equal lines

original: ri mo mnyam du lta bas na //
analyzed: ri mo mnyam du lta bas na //

original: des na shes rab can gyis spang //
analyzed: des na shes rab can gyis spang //

original: zhi dang sdig par lta bas na //
analyzed: zhi dang sdig par lta bas na //

original: lta ba'i chad pa 'byung pa ste //
analyzed: lta ba'i chad pa 'byung pa ste //

original: myur du gsod par byed pa yin //
analyzed: myur du gsod par byed pa yin //

original: sgra gcan gyis ni rgyu ba yi //
analyzed: sgra gcan gyis ni rgyu ba yi //

original: dus ni mdo ru bsdus pa yin //
analyzed: dus ni mdo ru bsdus pa yin //

original: yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag gis //
analyzed: yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag gis //

analyzed: blo ldan 'bad de shes par bya // mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
translated: the wise should understand with effort.🔽The vajra dakini, supreme bliss,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /

original: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
translated: Vajrasattva, the tathāgata,

analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
translated: was spoken by the blessed one, the vajra holder.

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las //
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las //
translated: From the great king of tantras, the glorious Vajradāka,

analyzed: tshes grangs dang skar ma'i nges pa rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////

analyzed: nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che //

analyzed: sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa //

original: lus can kun gyi rnam shes te //
analyzed: lus can kun gyi rnam shes te //
translated: the consciousness of all embodied beings,

original: lus las 'das shing dri ma med //
analyzed: lus las 'das shing dri ma med //

analyzed: lhun po dang ni ti se dang // de bzhin du ni 'bigs byed sogs //

original: shar gyi lus 'phags ba lang spyod //
analyzed: shar gyi lus 'phags ba lang spyod //

original: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ni //
analyzed: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ni //
translated: and Kuru in the north,

analyzed: dzam bu'i gling dang bcas pa dang // lan tshva can dang 'o ma yi //
translated: together with the Rose-Apple Isle,🔽the salt ocean, the ocean of milk,🔽and the mass of water of the oceans,

analyzed: rgya mtsho la sogs chu tshogs dang // 'og dang steng du gang gyur pa //

analyzed: khams @425a *// gsum ma lus zad par bya //

analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang // skye mched khams rnams zad par bya //

original: 'byung po la sogs phyogs bcu yi //
analyzed: 'byung po la sogs phyogs bcu yi //

analyzed: 'jig rten khams kun zad bsams te // dngos dang dngos med 'dres par ni //
translated: are all the worlds of the ten directions.🔽One should meditate on the self

original: bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya //

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams //

analyzed: mnyam nyid stong pa nyid du blta; ;thams cad nam mkhar thim nas ni //

analyzed: ba lang rmig par grong khyer bsgom // rnal 'byor can gyis cho ga bzhin //
translated: one should meditate on the city as the hoofprint of a cow.🔽The yogī should meditate on the mind

original: sems ni me mar lta bur bsgom //
analyzed: sems ni me mar lta bur bsgom //
translated: like a lamp, according to the rite.🔽Looking with the mind into its center,

original: de dbus yid kyis bltas nas ni; ;der ni mtshan ma brtag par bya //
analyzed: de dbus yid kyis bltas nas ni; ;der ni mtshan ma brtag par bya //

analyzed: me mar lta bus zhi bar gyur //

analyzed: dmar pos brgyan na rgyas pa ste //

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ni //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ni //

original: chags pa la sogs 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: chags pa la sogs 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: it is for accomplishing desire and so forth.

original: tha mar du ba 'am nag mthong na //
analyzed: tha mar du ba 'am nag mthong na //
translated: If in the end it is seen as smoke or black,

original: mngon spyod du ni grags pa yin //
analyzed: mngon spyod du ni grags pa yin //
translated: it is renowned as being for destroying.

original: rlung gi mdog ltar rab 'khrugs na //
analyzed: rlung gi mdog ltar rab 'khrugs na //

original: de ma thag tu bskrad par 'gyur //
analyzed: de ma thag tu bskrad par 'gyur //

analyzed: 'od zer dkar po long long pos // blo ldan sngags kyi dngos grub ni //

analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub ces bya //

original: bkra shis kyi ni lam ston yin //
analyzed: bkra shis kyi ni lam ston yin //

analyzed: chog 'dis ni gzhan gsal dang / gzhan gyi gzugs sogs dbu ma rnams //

original: ye shes la sogs sems kyis ni //
analyzed: ye shes la sogs sems kyis ni //

analyzed: gang zhig stong nyid shes byas na //

original: sems ni myur du thar par 'gyur //
analyzed: sems ni myur du thar par 'gyur //

analyzed: ye shes kyis ni shes bya brtag /

original: shes @425b byas 'gro ba brtag par bya //
analyzed: shes @425b byas 'gro ba brtag par bya //

original: pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing //
analyzed: pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing //

original: bram ze gtsang ma gnyis bzung nas //
analyzed: bram ze gtsang ma gnyis bzung nas //

original: mi de dag par 'gyur zhes bya //
analyzed: mi de dag par 'gyur zhes bya //

original: ye shes rang bzhin kun dang sbyor //
analyzed: ye shes rang bzhin kun dang sbyor //

analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /
translated: the supreme bliss of the Vajra dakini,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
translated: Vajrasattva, the Tathagata,

original: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las /
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las /
translated: From the great king of tantras, the glorious Shri Vajradaka,

analyzed: ye shes 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o ////

original: ye shes khyad par gang gis ni //
analyzed: ye shes khyad par gang gis ni //

original: ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa //
analyzed: ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa //

original: bye brag can ni ji lta bu //
analyzed: bye brag can ni ji lta bu //

original: lha las rol mo mnyan par 'tshal //
analyzed: lha las rol mo mnyan par 'tshal //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //

analyzed: lci bar gyur pa sum cu pos //

analyzed: dge dang sdig pa'i 'bras 'byung ba //

original: nga rgyal gyis ni byin brlabs pa //
analyzed: nga rgyal gyis ni byin brlabs pa //

original: sems kyis byas pa'i las tshogs kyis //
analyzed: sems kyis byas pa'i las tshogs kyis //

original: bsgoms par gyur pa'i rang rig pa'i //
analyzed: bsgoms par gyur pa'i rang rig pa'i //
translated: The mind of one’s own awareness,🔽which has become meditation, goes there.

original: sems ni 'gro ba de ru 'gro //
analyzed: sems ni 'gro ba de ru 'gro //
translated: One does not see the going of that mind,

original: srid pa'i zhags pas rtag 'jigs pas //🔽de yi 'gro pa mi mthong ngo //🔽'du shes rnam pa lnga dang ni //
analyzed: srid pa'i zhags pas rtag 'jigs pas // de yi 'gro pa mi mthong ngo // 'du shes rnam pa lnga dang ni //
translated: because it is always frightened by the noose of existence.🔽One goes beyond with the five types of discernment

original: lta ba lnga yis pha rol 'gro //
analyzed: lta ba lnga yis pha rol 'gro //
translated: and the five views.

original: lha yi ye shes gsal bar blta //
analyzed: lha yi ye shes gsal bar blta //

original: lha min ye shes khro ba'o //
analyzed: lha min ye shes khro ba'o //

original: yi dvags ye shes zhan pa ste //
analyzed: yi dvags ye shes zhan pa ste //

original: dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs pas non //
analyzed: dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs pas non //

original: byol song ye shes blun pa ste //
analyzed: byol song ye shes blun pa ste //

original: brtan pa rnams ni sems med pa'o //
analyzed: brtan pa rnams ni sems med pa'o //

original: rgyu ba'i ye shes rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: rgyu ba'i ye shes rnam pa lnga //

original: glen pas bsgribs dang lkugs pa dang // byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can //
analyzed: glen pas bsgribs dang lkugs pa dang // byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can //

original: sems can yongs @426a *//
analyzed: sems can yongs @426a *//
translated: The wisdom of the bodhisattvas is🔽the wisdom of the buddhas.🔽The wisdom of the buddhas is🔽the wisdom of the great bliss.🔽The wisdom of the great bliss is🔽the wisdom of the great secret.🔽The wisdom of the great secret is🔽the wisdom of the great vehicle.🔽The wisdom of the great vehicle is

original: su ma smin dang // bla ma'i lam ni sun 'byin pa //
analyzed: su ma smin dang // bla ma'i lam ni sun 'byin pa //
translated: the wisdom of the great yoga.🔽The wisdom of the great yoga is

original: de dag kun gyis mi shes te //
analyzed: de dag kun gyis mi shes te //
translated: the wisdom of the great seal.🔽The wisdom of the great seal is🔽the wisdom of the great bliss.🔽The wisdom of the great bliss is

original: gsang chen sangs rgyas spyod yul lo //
analyzed: gsang chen sangs rgyas spyod yul lo //
translated: the wisdom of the great secret.🔽The wisdom of the great secret is🔽the wisdom of the great vehicle.🔽The wisdom of the great vehicle is🔽the wisdom of the great yoga.

original: ye shes de nyid kyi bye brag dag /
analyzed: ye shes de nyid kyi bye brag dag /
translated: The wisdom of the great yoga is🔽the wisdom of the great seal.🔽The wisdom of the great seal is

original: bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol //
analyzed: bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol //
translated: the wisdom of the great bliss.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //🔽ye shes de nyid bye brag dag /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa // ye shes de nyid bye brag dag /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: nyon cig yang dag sgyu ma che //
analyzed: nyon cig yang dag sgyu ma che //
translated: “Listen, O Great Illusion,🔽to the distinctions of that very wisdom.

original: las rnams kyi ni bye brag gis //
analyzed: las rnams kyi ni bye brag gis //

original: ye shes bye brag sprul pa yin //
analyzed: ye shes bye brag sprul pa yin //

original: dman dang rab dman dman pa can /
analyzed: dman dang rab dman dman pa can /

original: gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po //
analyzed: gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po //

original: klu dang byol song gsang bab //
analyzed: klu dang byol song gsang bab //

original: lto 'phye dang ni mi'am ci //
analyzed: lto 'phye dang ni mi'am ci //

analyzed: mi dang yi dvags mkha' 'gro ma //

analyzed: dmyal ba la sogs gang 'gyur dang // gsal ba'i gzugs su mngon brjod dang // phra mo sgo nga las byung ba //
translated: are said to be manifest in clear forms,🔽subtle, born from eggs,

original: chu dang med dang rlung dang ni //
analyzed: chu dang med dang rlung dang ni //
translated: water, fire, wind,

original: de bzhin du ni sa yi khams //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni sa yi khams //

analyzed: brtan pa la sogs thams cad dang // rtsa dang 'dab ma phra ba dang // sa dang rdo dang brag las sogs //

original: thams cad ye shes byin brlabs pas //
analyzed: thams cad ye shes byin brlabs pas //
translated: are all blessed by wisdom.

original: thams cad snang ste gzhan du ni //
analyzed: thams cad snang ste gzhan du ni //
translated: Everything appears, but otherwise

original: ye shes med par skye mi 'gyur //
analyzed: ye shes med par skye mi 'gyur //

original: skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu //
analyzed: skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu //

analyzed: sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul bas // de nas rnal 'byor bstan bcos la //

analyzed: 'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya // gang gyi gnas dang mtshungs pa yi //

original: phyi rol bstan bcos sun 'byin pa //
analyzed: phyi rol bstan bcos sun 'byin pa //

original: rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs na //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs na //

analyzed: spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu 'thob //

analyzed: snying po las kyang snying po mchog /

analyzed: rdo rje dag ni thams cad kyang //

analyzed: gser la sogs pa legs par brdung //

analyzed: chu srin las ni byung ba yi //

analyzed: rtse dgu zhes ni bya ba ste //

analyzed: cha ni nyi shu rtsa bdun la //

analyzed: 'dab ma la ni gang gnas pa'i //

analyzed: rdo rje kun la blo ldan pas //

analyzed: padma zla ba la gnas pa'i //

analyzed: rtse mo dag ni rnam lnga la //

analyzed: gdug la rdo rje rtse gsum ste //

analyzed: rtse mo dag ni gdengs par bya //

analyzed: de bzhin rtse mo gcig pa ni //

translated: Oṃ śrī vajra he he ru ru kāra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽ḍākinī jālāṃ sambaraṃ svāhā🔽Oṃ vajra vairocanīye svāhā🔽Oṃ hrīḥ ha ha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ hana mahā svāhā huṃ🔽Boṣa dahe🔽Hūṃ hūṃ ho🔽Phaṭ haṃ svāhā🔽Oṃ haṃ hīṃ hūṃ🔽Hem hem hā🔽Oṃ vaṃ🔽Haṃ yoṃ🔽Hriṃ moṃ🔽Hreṃ hraiṃ🔽Hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ🔽Oṃ sarva buddha vajra parṇanīya🔽Vajra ḍākinīye svāhā🔽Oṃ sumbha ni sumbha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ grihṇa grihṇa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ grihṇāpaya grihṇāpaya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ ānayaho bhagavān vidyā rāja hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā🔽Oṃ vajra ḍākinī varṣa pāya hūṃ bhrūṃ svāhā🔽

analyzed: mthong dang de bzhin reg pa dang // tsum pa na dang rtag par 'khyud //

analyzed: gzhan du nam yang ma yin no //

analyzed: gang zhig rtag tu sngags sbyin pa //

analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //

analyzed: 'tshe ba dang ni tshe ring bar // bong bu'i tshul gyi rnal 'byor gyis //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //

analyzed: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //

analyzed: nyin re'am yang na zla re'am //

analyzed: yang na de bzhin lo re ni //

analyzed: ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs na ni //

analyzed: padmo'i snod ni bzung nas su // lag pa g-yas pa ba dan ni //

analyzed: gsum par byas te bsgom par bya //

analyzed: lo gcig bar du'ang ma byas na //

analyzed: sgrub pos dam tshig spangs 'gyur te //

analyzed: des ni dam tshig sbyangs nas su //

analyzed: slar yang mi bya'i sdom pa blang //

analyzed: rim pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur; ;mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /

original: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //

analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs // rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las /

analyzed: brda yis rol pa dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o;; ;;mtshon cha kun gyi mtshan nyid ni //

analyzed: rab tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon //

analyzed: 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen mi 'phen dang // de bzhin lag pas 'phen pa dang // 'phangs nas slar ni gzung pa dang // lag pas 'gyed dang rnam pa lnga //

original: dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dang // ltong rgyud sbyor dang 'dren dang myur //
analyzed: dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dang // ltong rgyud sbyor dang 'dren dang myur //

analyzed: 'gengs dang 'phen dang gsal ba 'o //

analyzed: grims pa nyid dang sran 'dzugs dang // mnyen zhing yan lag brtan pa dang // rgya chen 'gongs shing rnam par dag /

analyzed: lus @436b gyi phyag rgya bde blag can //

analyzed: 'di yis lus la brgyan nas ni // rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang // mkha' 'gros gtses dang gdon rnams kyis //

original: nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro //

original: rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul du //
analyzed: rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul du //
translated: In the manner of drawing to one’s heart,

analyzed: bde blag can gyis gzhu bzung nas //
translated: holding the bow of the easy one,

original: g-yas su rab tu bskor byed cing //
analyzed: g-yas su rab tu bskor byed cing //
translated: turning to the right,

original: mngal 'phangs na ni grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: mngal 'phangs na ni grub par 'gyur //
translated: if one draws the bowstring, one will be successful.

original: shar phyogs legs par bsrangs nas ni //
analyzed: shar phyogs legs par bsrangs nas ni //

original: nub phyogs cung zad bkug nas su //
analyzed: nub phyogs cung zad bkug nas su //
translated: having bent slightly to the west,

original: gzhu rgyud dal bus drangs na ni //
analyzed: gzhu rgyud dal bus drangs na ni //
translated: if one draws the bowstring slowly,

original: 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur //

original: thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //🔽rna drung bar du zlum por ni //
analyzed: thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o // rna drung bar du zlum por ni //
translated: This is the seal of summoning all.🔽Having held well, as appropriate,

original: ci rigs par ni legs par bzung //
analyzed: ci rigs par ni legs par bzung //
translated: a circle near the ear,

original: yi ge aom gyis khar drangs te //
analyzed: yi ge aom gyis khar drangs te //
translated: The syllable oṃ is drawn into the mouth,

original: ji srid yi ge aa brjod pa //
analyzed: ji srid yi ge aa brjod pa //
translated: and as long as the syllable a is uttered,🔽it should be held.

original: de srid bar du gzung bar bya; ;'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o //🔽ci rigs par ni drangs nas su //
analyzed: de srid bar du gzung bar bya; ;'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o // ci rigs par ni drangs nas su //

original: cho ga bzhin du bzung nas su //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du bzung nas su //
translated: and having held it according to the rite,

original: der ni cung zad dbye bar bya //
analyzed: der ni cung zad dbye bar bya //

original: 'gengs pa thams cad grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gengs pa thams cad grub par 'gyur //

original: 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o //

original: chad pas 'ben ni bsgribs nas su //🔽mig ni cung zad gdangs te blta //
analyzed: chad pas 'ben ni bsgribs nas su // mig ni cung zad gdangs te blta //

original: lta ba chang ba la gtad de //
analyzed: lta ba chang ba la gtad de //
translated: Aiming the gaze at the target,

original: myur du 'phangs na 'grub pa'i mchog /
analyzed: myur du 'phangs na 'grub pa'i mchog /
translated: if one quickly shoots, it is the supreme accomplishment.

original: mda' gzhus rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mda' gzhus rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o //

original: gru bzhi pa dang rnon po dang // de bzhin kun nas zlum po ste //
analyzed: gru bzhi pa dang rnon po dang // de bzhin kun nas zlum po ste //
translated: The square, the sharp, and likewise the completely round,

original: g-yas phyogs nas ni bskor nas su //
analyzed: g-yas phyogs nas ni bskor nas su //
translated: having turned to the right,

original: steng dang de bzhin 'og tu @437a *//
analyzed: steng dang de bzhin 'og tu @437a *//

original: ni; ;rim gyis gnon cing drag tu gnon //
analyzed: ni; ;rim gyis gnon cing drag tu gnon //

original: 'bigs pa bcu yi rgya mchog gis //
analyzed: 'bigs pa bcu yi rgya mchog gis //

original: khams gsum rgyal srid chen po la //
analyzed: khams gsum rgyal srid chen po la //
translated: in the great kingdom of the three realms,

original: bde bar rgyal zhing longs spyod 'gyur //
analyzed: bde bar rgyal zhing longs spyod 'gyur //

original: dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba bla na med pa'o //

original: mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
translated: The union of all ḍākinīs

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /

original: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
translated: Vajrasattva, the tathāgata,

original: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
translated: has spoken, O Blessed One, O Vajra Holder.

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las /
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las /
translated: From the great king of tantras, the glorious Vajraḍāka,

original: mtshon cha thams cad kyi brda'i ye shes kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: mtshon cha thams cad kyi brda'i ye shes kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
translated: the stage of the rite of the wisdom of the symbols of all weapons is the thirty-seventh.

original: pho nya gdul ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
analyzed: pho nya gdul ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
translated: The method of practice of the training of the messengers

original: de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
analyzed: de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
translated: will now be explained.🔽Whether they are ordinary beings with a mantra body

original: tha mal sngags kyi lus can dang // zhing skyes ma ni gang yang rung //🔽sgrub pos de dag thams cad la //
analyzed: tha mal sngags kyi lus can dang // zhing skyes ma ni gang yang rung // sgrub pos de dag thams cad la //
translated: or field-born,🔽the practitioner should accomplish their bliss

original: phan pa'i mchog gis bde ba sgrub //🔽'di dag gnas pa longs spyod kyi //
analyzed: phan pa'i mchog gis bde ba sgrub // 'di dag gnas pa longs spyod kyi //
translated: with the supreme benefit for all of them.🔽One should not serve them

original: bsnyen bkur gyis ni bsten mi bya //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur gyis ni bsten mi bya //
translated: with the worship of their dwelling and enjoyments.

original: skal bzang phyug cing sra ba ste //🔽rang gi bkra shis rigs spyod dang // ri mo can ni sems g-yo zhing //🔽'o ma 'dzin sbom padma can //
analyzed: skal bzang phyug cing sra ba ste // rang gi bkra shis rigs spyod dang // ri mo can ni sems g-yo zhing // 'o ma 'dzin sbom padma can //
translated: The fortunate one is wealthy and strong.🔽The one with good fortune is of good family,🔽the one with a mark is deceitful,🔽the one with full breasts is passionate,

original: lte ba dung 'dra dung can ma //
analyzed: lte ba dung 'dra dung can ma //
translated: the one with a navel like a conch is a conch.

original: de dag rim pa bzhin du brjod //

analyzed: bsgrub bya'i lus ni phyi nang du //
translated: the body of the victim, inside and out,

original: de yis gang bar bsgoms byas na //
analyzed: de yis gang bar bsgoms byas na //
translated: is meditated upon as filled with it.

original: bsgrub bya rmongs shing brgyal 'gyur la //🔽sems med lus ni 'dar gyur nas; ;rmongs pas sgrub pa po yi ni //
analyzed: bsgrub bya rmongs shing brgyal 'gyur la // sems med lus ni 'dar gyur nas; ;rmongs pas sgrub pa po yi ni //
translated: The victim becomes confused and faints,🔽and the body, devoid of mind and trembling,

original: dbang du 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos //
analyzed: dbang du 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos //
translated: is brought under the power of the practitioner through delusion, without a doubt.

original: ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ni //
analyzed: ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ni //
translated: The king called “ba”

original: gru bzhi pa la stobs po che //🔽dung dang zla 'dra dkar po'i mdog /
analyzed: gru bzhi pa la stobs po che // dung dang zla 'dra dkar po'i mdog /
translated: is square, and Mahābala🔽is the color of a conch or the moon, white.

original: zla ba'i @455b 'od can bsgrub bya ni //
analyzed: zla ba'i @455b 'od can bsgrub bya ni //
translated: The victim, who has the luster of the moon,

original: dbus su sgrub pos thim par bsam //
analyzed: dbus su sgrub pos thim par bsam //
translated: is imagined to dissolve into the middle of the practitioner.

original: de lus dug gis mi tshugs shing //
analyzed: de lus dug gis mi tshugs shing //
translated: His body is not harmed by poison

original: nad la sogs pas gzir mi 'gyur //
analyzed: nad la sogs pas gzir mi 'gyur //
translated: and is not afflicted by disease and so forth.

original: rims dang bkres dang skom mi 'byung //
analyzed: rims dang bkres dang skom mi 'byung //
translated: Fever, hunger, and thirst do not occur.

original: 'di ni rtag tu bsgoms gyur na //
analyzed: 'di ni rtag tu bsgoms gyur na //
translated: If this is always meditated upon,

original: tshe ring nad med rgyal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: tshe ring nad med rgyal bar 'gyur //
translated: long life, good health, and victory will occur.

original: bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
analyzed: bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
translated: By this application of meditative concentration,

original: zla ba dmar dang bcas pa ru //
analyzed: zla ba dmar dang bcas pa ru //
translated: together with the red moon,

original: lhan cig tu ni bzlas gyur na //
analyzed: lhan cig tu ni bzlas gyur na //
translated: if one recites together with it,

original: rtag tu bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'drar 'gyur //🔽de nas rgyal po bha zhes pa'i //
analyzed: rtag tu bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'drar 'gyur // de nas rgyal po bha zhes pa'i //
translated: Always becomes like a stream of nectar.🔽Then listen to the supreme rite

original: las kyi mchog ni mnyan par gyis //
analyzed: las kyi mchog ni mnyan par gyis //
translated: Of the king called Bha.

original: dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu ste //
analyzed: dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu ste //
translated: Like a weapon of the senses,

original: nyi ma 'char ka lta bu'i mdog /
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ka lta bu'i mdog /
translated: The color of the rising sun,

original: bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo ru //
analyzed: bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo ru //
translated: On the head of the one to be accomplished,

original: rgyal ba'i mchog ni rtag bsam la //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i mchog ni rtag bsam la //
translated: Always think of the supreme victor.🔽With the king of syllables

original: de yi lus ni ma lus par //🔽yi ge'i rgyal pos dbug par bya //
analyzed: de yi lus ni ma lus par // yi ge'i rgyal pos dbug par bya //
translated: Pierce his entire body.

original: rmongs shing sems dang bral 'gyur te //
analyzed: rmongs shing sems dang bral 'gyur te //
translated: He will become confused and lose his mind,

original: rdo rje yin yang brgyal gyur nas //🔽mche bas zin ltar skad cig la //
analyzed: rdo rje yin yang brgyal gyur nas // mche bas zin ltar skad cig la //
translated: Even if he is vajra, he will faint.🔽Like being bitten by a fanged [animal], in an instant

original: ltung zhing 'chi ba nyid gyur pas //
analyzed: ltung zhing 'chi ba nyid gyur pas //
translated: He will fall and die.

original: de yi srog ni rmongs par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi srog ni rmongs par 'gyur //
translated: His life will be confused.

original: dgra ni lo brgyar 'tsho ba yang //
analyzed: dgra ni lo brgyar 'tsho ba yang //
translated: Even if the enemy lives for a hundred years,

original: skad cig gis ni 'chi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: skad cig gis ni 'chi bar 'gyur //
translated: In an instant he will die.

original: de nas gzi brjid chen po yi //
analyzed: de nas gzi brjid chen po yi //
translated: Then, of the one with great splendor,

original: yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga pa //
analyzed: yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga pa //
translated: The twenty-five syllables,

original: ma zhes bya ba dam pa mchog /
analyzed: ma zhes bya ba dam pa mchog /
translated: The supreme, excellent one called Ma,

original: de yi las ni ji bzhin nyon //
analyzed: de yi las ni ji bzhin nyon //
translated: Listen to his rite as it is.

original: tsam pa ka ltar ser ba'i mdog /
analyzed: tsam pa ka ltar ser ba'i mdog /
translated: The color of saffron,

original: bskal ba'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar //
analyzed: bskal ba'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar //
translated: Blazing with splendor like the fire at the end of the eon,

original: 'od ni glog ltar 'khyug pa bzhin //
analyzed: 'od ni glog ltar 'khyug pa bzhin //
translated: and with light flickering like lightning.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i steng bsam la //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i steng bsam la //
translated: Visualize it above the object of the rite,🔽and with its light

original: de yi 'od kyis bsgrub bya yi //
analyzed: de yi 'od kyis bsgrub bya yi //
translated: the object of the rite,

original: steng dang 'og @456a *//🔽ni ma lus par //
analyzed: steng dang 'og @456a *// ni ma lus par //
translated: above and below,

original: lus ni kun tu g-yogs bsams na //
analyzed: lus ni kun tu g-yogs bsams na //
translated: is completely covered with a body.

original: gnod sbyin lha dang klu yi bu //
analyzed: gnod sbyin lha dang klu yi bu //
translated: The sons of yakṣas, gods, and nāgas,🔽piśācas, rākṣasas,🔽the lords of the syllables of the three realms,

original: sha za dang ni srin po dang // khams gsum yi ge'i bdag po dang // lha dang lha min mi dang bcas //
analyzed: sha za dang ni srin po dang // khams gsum yi ge'i bdag po dang // lha dang lha min mi dang bcas //
translated: together with gods, demigods, and humans,🔽are instantly brought under control

original: sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi //🔽skad cig gis ni dbang 'gyur bar //
analyzed: sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi // skad cig gis ni dbang 'gyur bar //
translated: by the great practitioner himself.

original: mdor bsdus ngas ni khyod la bshad //
analyzed: mdor bsdus ngas ni khyod la bshad //
translated: I will explain it to you in brief.

original: ya zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /
analyzed: ya zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /
translated: The supreme syllable ya,
